title: I Got A 14 day Suspension
body:
Hello Riot, yesterday I played a match of LoL as Karthus. I had just bought him that day and it was my first game. Sadly, I fed. After that game I reopened the client and got a pop up that said I had a 14 day suspension for chat behavior (I can’t truly recall what it said). I did curse a bit that game but not in an offensive way and not directed to anyone. Also, I used the /pause command in chat ( someone on my team said there was’ such a command and I tried it) so idk if that’s why. I’m just kinda confused and please tell me if I did anything wrong and I’ll try to learn from my mistake(s). Or if this is a bug or something else non related to the game, I would appreciate you guys unban me. Thank you!

Edit: This is my first suspension/ban. Also feel free to call me out Riot (I’m not trying to be mean).

replies.body: You don't get a 14 day for ONE game. You get it over multiple games so you are lying and you got banned for something else cause its very unlikely its "feeding".

Unless it's something against the non-tolerated policy. Like racial slurs.
You'll skip your two penalties and move onto a 14-day ban.

So Toxic = 3, Racial SLurs= 1 what does this mean =?

Next time you get a permanent ban, so stop trying to pretend you did nothing, and work on fixing it.
